Package at.fpmedv.jdbc

Class Summary
ConnectionDecorator ConnectionDecorator class wraps around an existing Connection implementation and all calls are made against the underlying Connection Object.
Driver The Java SQL at.fpmedv.Driver allows to add more behavior to any existing jdbc driver following the decorator pattern.
NonRegisteringDriver This is the actual implementation of the java.sql.Driver
PreparedStatementDecorator PreparedStatementDecorator class wraps around an existing PreparedStatement implementation and all calls are made against the underlying Object.
StatementDecorator StatementDecorator class wraps around an existing Statement implementation and all calls are made against the underlying Object.
